ygData.subject: Re: Characters in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the bard and enchanter classes both not only appeal a little more to women - but to the older player as well.  Both are surprisingly similar if not in
ygData.messageBody:
I think the bard and enchanter classes both not only appeal a little more
to women - but to the older player as well. Both are surprisingly similar
if not in function - in role. Our best moments are when we are making
OTHERS better - support.

Is this a female thing? Probably - also something the older player also
enjoys more. I don't feel any particular need to be the center of
attention, nor the Avatar.

I also found crafts a fantastic outlet for creativity and player
interraction - at least before they nerfed them so badly I was actually
penalized for trying to live that kind of life.


>and, to make this bard related... I think the bard class and the cleric
>class appeal most to females because of their cooperative roles and their
>ability to make others around them stronger... agree? disagree?
